Notes from a from a plant biologist
  • Chris Buddenhagen
  • My publications

My publications

Publication topics

-Weed focused papers in New Zealand (Buddenhagen et al. 1998, Buddenhagen & Hollingsworth 2000, Flynn & Buddenhagen 2000, Timmins et al. 2000, Bourdôt et al. 2018, Dowsett et al. 2018a, a, Dowsett et al. 2018b, Buddenhagen et al. 2019, 2021a, b, Ngow et al. 2020, 2021, Rubenstein et al. 2021, Buddenhagen et al. 2022b, c, c, Buddenhagen et al. 2022a, Ghanizadeh et al. 2022a, b, Bourdôt & Buddenhagen 2023)

-Weeds generally (Buddenhagen et al. 1998, Buddenhagen 2000, Buddenhagen & Hollingsworth 2000, Flynn & Buddenhagen 2000, Timmins et al. 2000, Rogg et al. 2003, Buddenhagen et al. 2009, Chimera et al. 2010, Gordon et al. 2010, 2016-01/2016-03, Hawaii Department of Transportation 2012, Buddenhagen 2013a, b, 2014a, b, c, 2015a, Gardener et al. 2013, Buddenhagen 2015b, 2016a, Buddenhagen & Tye 2015, Bourdôt et al. 2018, Dowsett et al. 2018a, Dowsett et al. 2018b, Ghanizadeh et al. 2019)

-Plant epidemiology (Buddenhagen et al. 2017a, Garrett et al. 2018, Andersen et al. 2019, Buddenhagen et al. 2021b, Buddenhagen et al. 2022d)

-Evolutionary plant biology (Buddenhagen 2016b, Buddenhagen et al. 2017b, Ribeiro et al. 2018, Ghanizadeh et al. 2019, Burchardt et al. 2020, Cai et al. 2021, Costa et al. 2021)

-Galapagos themed (Rogg et al. 2003, Buddenhagen et al. 2004, Buddenhagen & Yánez 2005, Buddenhagen 2006, Buddenhagen & Jewell 2006, Rentería & Buddenhagen 2006, Guézou et al. 2007, Guerrero et al. 2008, Guézou et al. 2010, Gardener et al. 2013, Buddenhagen & Tye 2015)
